Metaware.description: Free 1.8 client designed for blatant use on cracked servers such as BlocksMC or Pika Network. Bypass common anticheats with ease.

Atani.description: A free client with premium version designed to bypass even the best anticheats, private or not, on the market. Atani contains bypasses for EVERY server and 1.7-1.19 multiplayer support

Shiba.description: An exploit client designed to run on the latest version while supporting all past versions. Shiba has features such as premium server crashers and latest exploits
